The User Interface for Command and Control of Embedded Systems

Now with support for the XTCE command and telemetry standard

Full Lifecycle

Use the same interface from test to operations. Test automation, data display, graphs and more.

How COSMOS works →

Open Source

All of the code is open source - no surprises, easy to debug, and fully documented.

View Source →

Support Available

Commercial licenses, support contracts, and complete configuration support available.

Contact Us →

Get up and running in seconds.

(See Full Installation Instructions)

Quick-start Instructions

# On Windows:

C:\> INSTALL_COSMOS.bat

# On Linux/Mac:

$ bash <(\curl -sSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/BallAerospace/COSMOS/master/vendor/installers/linux_mac/INSTALL_COSMOS.sh)

# => Now launch the COSMOS tools
